name: {{ job_name }}
description: The ***run_customermgmt*** paramater accepts either ***YES*** or ***NO***.  If this XML file has already been ingested, the *dw_init* task does **NOT** remove it (since it is kind of a pain). Therefore, if you want to disable this task and just keep the existing historical customermgmt staging table then change to ***NO***.  It is set to ***YES*** by default.

base_parameters.tgt_query: *, cast(substring(_metadata.file_path FROM (position('/Batch', _metadata.file_path) + 6) FOR 1) as int) batchid

base_parameters.raw_schema: sk_dateid BIGINT, datevalue DATE, datedesc STRING, calendaryearid INT, calendaryeardesc STRING, calendarqtrid INT, calendarqtrdesc STRING, calendarmonthid INT, calendarmonthdesc STRING, calendarweekid INT, calendarweekdesc STRING, dayofweeknum INT, dayofweekdesc STRING, fiscalyearid INT, fiscalyeardesc STRING, fiscalqtrid INT, fiscalqtrdesc STRING, holidayflag BOOLEAN
sk_timeid BIGINT, timevalue STRING, hourid INT, hourdesc STRING, minuteid INT, minutedesc STRING, secondid INT, seconddesc STRING, markethoursflag BOOLEAN, officehoursflag BOOLEAN
tx_id STRING, tx_name STRING, tx_rate FLOAT
tt_id STRING, tt_name STRING, tt_is_sell INT, tt_is_mrkt INT
in_id STRING, in_name STRING, in_sc_id STRING

base_parameters.tgt_query: * except(cdc_flag, cdc_dsn), cast(substring(_metadata.file_path FROM (position('/Batch', _metadata.file_path) + 6) FOR 1) as int) batchid
base_parameters.raw_schema: cdc_flag STRING, cdc_dsn BIGINT, hh_h_t_id INT, hh_t_id INT, hh_before_qty INT, hh_after_qty INT

base_parameters.tgt_query: * except(cdc_flag, cdc_dsn), cast(substring(_metadata.file_path FROM (position('/Batch', _metadata.file_path) + 6) FOR 1) as int) batchid
base_parameters.raw_schema: cdc_flag STRING , cdc_dsn BIGINT, w_c_id BIGINT, w_s_symb STRING, w_dts TIMESTAMP, w_action STRING

base_parameters.tgt_query: * except(cdc_flag, cdc_dsn), cast(substring(_metadata.file_path FROM (position('/Batch', _metadata.file_path) + 6) FOR 1) as int) batchid
base_parameters.raw_schema: cdc_flag STRING, cdc_dsn BIGINT, accountid BIGINT, brokerid BIGINT, customerid BIGINT, accountDesc STRING, taxstatus TINYINT, status STRING
